__e: What matters is our father and there's still good in him.
You showed me that there was still good in the world and that's why I came here today.
You have goodness in you - I can see it in your eyes... and you have the same eyes as her.
Surely the goodness and mercy... shall follow me all the days of my life, and I will dwell in the house of the Lord forever.
- Why did God make you? - God made me to show His goodness: to make me happy with Him in heaven.
Goodness and mercy all my life shall surely follow me, and in God's house forevermore...
